pages.text: Inna Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa `Amilu As-Salihati Sayaj`alu Lahumu Ar-Rahmanu Wuddaan
Fa'innama Yassarnahu Bilisanika Litubashira Bihi Al-Muttaqina Wa Tundhira Bihi Qawmaan Luddaan
Wa Kam 'Ahlakna Qablahum Min Qarnin Hal Tuhissu Minhum Min 'Ahadin 'Aw Tasma`u Lahum Rikzaan
Tanzilaan Mimman Khalaqa Al-'Arđa Wa As-Samawati Al-`Ula
Lahu Ma Fi As-Samawati Wa Ma Fi Al-'Arđi Wa Ma Baynahuma Wa Ma Tahta Ath-Thara
Wa 'In Tajhar Bil-Qawli Fa'innahu Ya`lamu As-Sirra Wa 'Akhfa
Allahu La 'Ilaha 'Illa Huwa Lahu Al-'Asma'u Al-Husna
Idh Ra'a Naraan Faqala Li'hlihi Amkuthu 'Inni 'Anastu Naraan La`alli 'Atikum Minha Biqabasin 'Aw 'Ajidu `Ala An-Nari Hudaan
Inni 'Ana Rabbuka Fakhla` Na`layka 'Innaka Bil-Wadi Al-Muqaddasi Tuaan
